news.markdown:
**Exciting news!.**
We are delighted to announce we have received our fifth Arts Council Grant to tour the UK with "It's Okay, I'm Dealing With It"in Autumn 2017 and Spring 2018.

We are performing in Bristol, Bath and London this November - come find us on the road! Details below. A NEW date has been added on our November date - 25th November in Leicester at Attenborough Arts Centre - as part of Here & Now festival by Tetrad Collective.
news.html:
Exciting news!.
We are delighted to announce we have received our fifth Arts Council Grant to tour the UK with “It’s Okay, I’m Dealing With It”in Autumn 2017 and Spring 2018.

We are performing in Bristol, Bath and London this November - come find us on the road! Details below. A NEW date has been added on our November date - 25th November in Leicester at Attenborough Arts Centre - as part of Here & Now festival by Tetrad Collective.

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn Performances**
**23 September** --- Merlin Theatre, Frome --- **[Tickets](http://www.merlintheatre.co.uk/whats-on/performances/?page=2)**
**7th October** -- The Centre, Newlyn (as part of National Rural Touring Dance Initiative) 

**_"It's okay, I'm dealing with it._" Autumn Tour**
**15--16 November** --- The Wardrobe Theatre, Bristol --- **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/okay-im-dealing/)**
**17 November** --- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University  --- ** [Tickets](https://www.bathspalive.com/Online/default.asp)**
**18--19 November** --- Camden People's Theatre --- ** [Tickets](https://www.cptheatre.co.uk/production/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it/)**
**25th November** - Attenborough Arts Centre, Leicester (as part of Here and Now Festival by Tetrad Collective) ** [Tickets](https://www2.le.ac.uk/hosted/attenborougharts/whatson/Performance%20and%20Spoken%20word/what-s-on-spoken-word#Here%20&%20Now) **

There will also be an Open Level workshop at The Wardrobe Theatre on 15 November --- **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/workshop-hiccup-project/)**
